title: what font? Script
content:
can anybody help me find this font?

Font: 

 handwritten (not a font)

author: ailinn03

comments.content:
Probably handwritten - not a font  
(all re-occurring letters like /o /a /e are different)
Are there any fonts that are similar?

You may want to take a look at Dafont's handwriting category to find something you like:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=603](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162818/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=603 "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=603")
